name: BostonT-time
0:
”Alexa, Ask Boston t. time when the next sixty nine bus will arrive at stop one four one nine”
”My stop is one four one nine”
”When is the next 69 bus”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: boston t. time
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Users can ask Alexa when the next MBTA bus would arrive using the stop id. You can find your stop ID at https://mbtasearch.herokuapp.com/ or from the bus stop sign. This is an opensource project on https://github.com/sajingeo/askMBTA

Credits: Melvin

Example Interaction:

User: “Alexa, open Boston T. Time”

Alexa : “Welcome to the Boston T-time app Please tell me your stop I D, and route number For example my stop ID is one four one nine and route number is sixty nine”. 

User: “my stop id is one four one nine.”

Alexa: “One four one nine is saved as your preferred stop. "

User: “When is the next sixty nine bus?”

Alexa: “The next bus 69 bus will arrive at stop one thousand one hundred and forty nine in 5 minutes "

User: “my stop id is one four one nine and bus number is sixty nine”. 

Alexa: “The next bus 69 bus towards Harvard, will arrive in 5 minutes".
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
